metadata.title: CVE-2023-32214 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Protocol handlers `ms-cxh` and `ms-cxh-full` could have been leveraged totrigger a denial of service. *Note: This attack only affects Windows. Otheroperating systems are not affected.* This vulnerability affects Firefox <113, Firefox ESR < 102.11, and Thunderbird < 102.11.

criterions.comment: firefox: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
thunderbird: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
